entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
